sent.orig: What is the Chinese equivalent of the word "victory"?
But victory was conceived in China's defeat, while defeat was conceived in Japan's victory.
sent.trans: 但是在中国的失败里面包含着胜利，在日本的胜利里面包含着失败。

sent.orig: We are marching from victory to victory.
Thus, the Party's cause will advance from victory to victory without stop. "
sent.trans: 这样，我们党的事业就会胜利前进。

sent.orig: Answer: The Lakers continue to rack up victory after victory, the latest coming impressively in Phoenix.
sent.trans: 答：湖人正取得一场场的胜利，最近一场令人难忘的比赛就来自于与菲尼克斯的那场。
